title: Cant connect to lol
body:
i cant login to lol
its says:"an unexpected error occurred while logging in. please try again.if the essue persists contact support at support.riotgames.com
and its not help's
pls help me

replies.body: Is this still an issue?  If you're still getting this error then your network might be blocked from reaching us.  Run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and tackle whatever is blocking your routing.  Hopefully you're able to get in now!
